name: BloofoxCMS
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: bloofoxCMS is a free open source content management system (CMS). bloofoxCMS is a small and easy to use CMS.

matches.regexp:
(?-mix:<!--[
\s]+This Website was generated by bloofoxCMS.[

\s]+//-->)
